Articles.Content:
To all of you who know I am alpha tech and I posted for some people to help me mod and nobody said nothing. So this will be my first mod but this mod is for 0.23 and above only tweak what fuel you want to use. my deadline is in May before it comes out but in March I am doing the actual modding and then in March/April i will begin my testing. I have just finished making the fuel tanks and I am now working on the engines.

Edited March 6, 2014 by alpha tech
corrections on my spelling
So what exactly does this mod do that you can't already do with stock?

this could be a great mod but we have no idea what you actually want to mod so it might be a good idea to add a description of what you intend to do i am looking forward to seeing where you take this good luck alpha tech on meeting your deadline in march or is it may i cant tell because you dont use punctuation

Well there's Modular Fuel Tanks and Real Fuels, so.. infact there's A LOT of fuel-oriented addons. But as the others have said you need to elaborate. And that's the least of it. If you want to get people interested then you have to put effort into your presentation. "My new fuel mod" ... Is not good presentation.

good luck alpha tech on meeting your deadline in march or is it may i cant tell because you dont use punctuation

Risking sounding like a grammar na zi , I agree. The lack of punctuation and capitals makes it hard to understand what the mod is actually supposed to do I do not think anyone expects forum visitors to make flawless posts, but when things become hard to understand it is an issue.

I second the above posters on the subject of grammar. This is a forum - you have time to put effort into making your posts readable, so there's no reason not to do it except pure laziness. This is not a txt msg or Twitter #HashtagsOnEverythingAreAnnoying

;P
Well I would if I wasn't on my lunch break at school when I wrote it and I also have a half cracked tablet I was using

Now some updates on my mod I have just finished making the resource file for the mod the oil and gas and deseil or I don't know how to pronounce it and gas is for the next version that comes out so I added a lot of useless stuff so I don't have to do that much work and next I am going to make a hydrogen fuel cell and if I can I will make a poll to see what parts you like about the mod the I will do more of the unanimous decision oh yeah and I need some advise OK I want to make an engine that switches fuel modes so that I can replace the stock parts an you use the tweakables to adjust what fuel and what engine so if you have an suggestion please email me at [email protected]

Edited March 2, 2014 by alpha tech

I'm not sure what this is, and please, add commas and periods, it's hard to read your sentances!

...And I hope you remember the challenge guidlines when you submit another challenge, eh?
this mod is just to use what kind fuel you want and later I might tweek the engine consumption on fuel

this could be a great mod but we have no idea what you actually want to mod so it might be a good idea to add a description of what you intend to do i am looking forward to seeing where you take this good luck alpha tech on meeting your deadline in march or is it may i cant tell because you dont use punctuation

<3 <3 <3 <3
I am no longer working on this mod I lost all my data for it
